name: Summoners: Elements Unleashed beta [FREE][GAME]
description:
READ ME! 

  1. The game will look and feel better if you DOWNLOAD THE ZIP FILE BELOW. 
  2. IF you choose to play in browser, the game needs to be in full screen to see everything (blue button under the game window)
  3. Seems to be some lag with inputs when playing in browser

Known Issues

  1. Some weird scaling issues with UI elements depending on window size
  2. VFX to come eventually.
  3. Working on game balance, game progression and the structure of deck building (which involves adding 2 new elements).  

This is my first project on unity. It is also my first strategy game. Very inspired by Slay the Spire, I would hope to eventually expand my gameplay features to similar heights. All feedback is welcomed. Also taking title suggestions.
